patch 8.2.2532: Vim9: confusing error if :k is used with a range

Problem:    Vim9: confusing error if :k is used with a range.
Solution:   Give an error about the range. (issue #7874)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2532: Vim9: confusing error if :k is used with a range · vim/vim@ada1d87
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2532: Vim9: confusing error if :k is used with a range · vim/vim@ada1d87
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: confusing error if :k is used with a range. Solution: Give an error about the range. (issue #7874)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/10b9421f3bb7ac971fa63bd025c4c603c98f4a49|patch 8.2.2531: Vim9: the :k command is obscure>
patch 8.2.2531: Vim9: the :k command is obscure

Problem:    Vim9: the :k command is obscure.
Solution:   Disallow using :k, can use :mark instead. (closes #7874)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2531: Vim9: the :k command is obscure · vim/vim@10b9421
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2531: Vim9: the :k command is obscure · vim/vim@10b9421
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: the :k command is obscure. Solution: Disallow using :k, can use :mark instead. (closes #7874)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/12d265315fac9e4f3436c38a87f6d9a23b9e7e2b|patch 8.2.2530: Vim9: not enough testing for profiling>
patch 8.2.2530: Vim9: not enough testing for profiling

Problem:    Vim9: not enough testing for profiling.
Solution:   Add a test with nested functions and a lambda.  Fix profiling
            for calling a compiled function.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2530: Vim9: not enough testing for profiling · vim/vim@12d2653
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2530: Vim9: not enough testing for profiling · vim/vim@12d2653
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: not enough testing for profiling. Solution: Add a test with nested functions and a lambda. Fix profiling for calling a compiled function.
